data.event: The first ore in the area was discovered in July 1891 by a mountain shepherd, who brought a curiously dense rock to show his foreman.

event.title: August 1891 more than 1000 miners had arrived

data.event: By August 1891 more than 1000 miners had arrived, and the number soon reached 1500.
By August 1891 more than 1000 miners had arrived, and the number soon reached 1500.
